column2: "Nna yɛdanee
column3: na yetuu hɛn kwan kɔr sar no do wɔ Mbɛw Po kwan do
column4: dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE kaa kyerɛɛ me no: na yekyiin Seir bepɔw ho nda pii."

column2: "Na EWURADZE kaa kyerɛɛ me dɛ
column4: "Hom ekyin bepɔw yi ho akyɛr dodow: hom ndan homho wɔ kwaamu afamu."

column2: "Na hyɛ ɔman no dɛ
column3: Hom rubotwa mu wɔ hom nuanom Esau mba a wɔtse Seir no ntoaado; na wobosuro hom: dɛm ntsi hom nhwɛ homho yie papa:"

column2: "mma wɔnnye hɔn nndzi aper; na meremmfa hɔn asaase no memma hom
column3: oho
column4: nnyɛ mbrɛ ɔnamɔn mpo betsia a: osiandɛ medze Seir bepɔw mama Esau dɛ ɔmfa."

column2: "Hom mfa sika ntɔ hɔn hɔ edziban
column3: na hom eedzi; na hom mfa sika ntɔ hɔn hɔ nsu so
column4: na hom aanom."

column2: "Na EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn ehyira wo wɔ wo nsaano edwuma nyinara mu: oehu wo nantsew wɔ sar kɛse yi do: mfe eduanan yi EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn edzi w'ekyir; ennhia wo biribiara."
"Nna yetwae fi hɛn nuanom Esaumba a wɔtse Seir no ho
column3: fi Araba kwan do fi Elat nye Ezion-geber. Na yɛdanee
column4: na yekotwaa mu wɔ Moab sar no do kwan do."

column2: "Na EWURADZE see me dɛ
column3: Mma nnhiahia Moab ho
column4: nkyii so mma nnye hɔn nndzi aper nnko: na meremmfa n'asaase mu bi memma wo mma emmfa; osiandɛ medze Ar ama Lotmba dɛ wɔmfa."

column2: "Emfo no na wɔtsenaa do nkan no
column3: ɔman kɛse a wɔdɔɔ so
column4: na wɔwowar dɛ Anakfo:"

column2: "iyinom so na wobu hɔn Refafo
column3: dɛ Anakfo; na Moabfo dze wɔfrɛ hɔn Emfo."

column2: "Horfo so na nkyɛ nkan no wɔtsenaa Seir
column3: na Esaumba no hyɛɛ hɔn ananmu; na wɔsɛɛ hɔn wɔ hɔn enyim
column4: na wɔtsenaa hɔn ananmu dɛ mbrɛ Israel yɛɛ n'enyadze asaase a EWURADZE dze maa hɔn no."

column2: "Afei hom nsoɛr
column3: na hom nkotwa ɔwora Zered. Na yekotwaa ɔwora Zered."

column2: "Na mfe dodow a yɛdze nantsewee fi Kades-barnea bodur dɛ yebotwaa ɔwora Zered no
column3: yɛ mfe eduasa awɔtwe; kodur dɛ akofo ebusuasantsen no nyinara wuwui wɔ nseraban no mu
column4: dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE kaa ho ntam no."

column2: "Nkyii so EWURADZE nsa tsiaa hɔn
column3: dɛ ɔresɛɛ hɔn efi nseraban no mu
column4: ekodu dɛ wɔbɛhyew."

column2: "Nna ɔbaa dɛ
column3: aber a akofo no nyinara hyewee na wowuwui fii ɔman no mu no
column7: "Ndɛ da yi na irubotwa mu wɔ Ar

column2: "na sɛ ikodu Ammonmba tsentsendo a
column3: mma nnhiahia hɔn ho
column4: na nnye hɔn nndzi aper so: na meremmfa Ammonmba asaase mu bi memma wo mma emmfa: osiandɛ medze mama Lotmba dɛ wɔmfa."

column2: "Ɔno so wobu no Refafo asaase; Refafo tsenaa do nkan no; na Ammonfo dze wɔfrɛ hɔn Zamzumfo;"
"ɔman kɛse a
column3: wɔdɔɔ so
column4: na wɔwowar dɛ Anakfo; na EWURADZE sɛɛ hɔn wɔ hɔn enyim; na wɔhyɛɛ hɔn ananmu:"

column2: "dɛ mbrɛ ɔyɛe maa Esaumba a wɔtse Seir
column3: aber a ɔsɛɛ Horfo wɔ hɔn enyim; na wɔhyɛɛ hɔn ananmu
column4: na wɔtsenaa hɔn ananmu araa dze bodu ndɛ da yi;"

column2: "na Avifo a wɔtsenatsenaa nkuroba araa dze kodu Gaza mu no
column3: Kaftorfo a
column4: wofi Kaftor bae no

column2: "Hom nsoɛr
column3: wontu hom kwan
column4: na wonkotwa Arnon bɔnsa; hwɛ
column7: nye n'asaase ahyɛ wo nsa: hyɛ ase fa
column8: na nye no ndzi aper nko."

column2: "Ndɛ da yi na mebɛhyɛ ase medze wo ho suro nye wo ho hu megu amanaman a wɔwɔ asaase nyina do a wɔbɛtse wo nka do
column3: na hɔn ho apopo
column4: na hɔn ho eguan hɔn wɔ wo ntsi."

column2: "Na Kedamot sar do na mifi mosomaa abɔfo ma wɔdze asomdwee nsɛm kɔr Hesbon hen Sihon nkyɛn dɛ
column4: "Ma muntwa mu wɔ w'asaase do: ɔtsempɔn do ara na mebɛfa akɔ

column2: "Tɔn me edziban gye sika
column3: ma mindzi; na ma me nsu gye sika ma monnom: ma memfa m'anan kwa mumbotwa mu;"

column2: "dɛ mbrɛ Esaumba a wɔtse Seir
column3: na Moabfo a wɔtse Ar
column4: yɛɛ me no; ma onkodu dɛ mubotwa Jordan akɔ asaase a EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn dze rema hɛn no do."

column2: "Na Hesbonhen Sihon amma hɛn kwan dɛ yentwa mu wɔ ne nkyɛn: osiandɛ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn maa no asoɔdzen sunsum
column3: na opiriim n'akoma
column4: ama ɔdze no aahyɛ wo nsa
column5: dɛ mbrɛ ɔtse ndɛ da yi."

column2: "Na EWURADZE see me dɛ
column3: Hwɛ
column4: mahyɛ ase meyi Sihon nye n'asaase mama wɔ w'enyim: hyɛ ase fa

column2: "Nna Sihon fiir edzi behyiaa hɛn
column3: ɔno nye ne man nyinara
column4: dɛ ɔrobɔko wɔ Jahaz."

column2: "Na EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn yii no mae wɔ hɛn enyim; na yekunkum ɔno
column3: nye ne mbabanyin
column4: nye ne man nyinara."

column2: "Na yɛfaa no nkurow nyinara aber no mu
column3: na yɛsɛɛ kurow biara a nyimpa tse mu no pasapasa
column4: dze kaa mbaa nye mbofraba ho; yeenngyaa biara mma ɔannka:"

column2: "ofiembowa nko na hɛnara yɛfaa no afonam
column3: dze kaa nkurow a yɛfae no mu asadze ho."

column2: "Ofi Aroer a ɔwɔ Arnon ɔbɔn no ano
column3: na ofi kurow a ɔwɔ Arnon ɔbɔn no mu no do
column4: araa dze kɔ Gilead
column5: kurow biara nnyi hɔ a ɔyɛɛ dzen dodow maa hɛn: EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn yii ne nyinara mae wɔ hɛn enyim:"

column2: "Ammonmba asaase no nko na ɔwo ammbɛn ho; esutsen Jabbok ne nkyɛn nyinara
column3: nye nkurow a ɔwɔ nkokodo nkurow mu no
column4: nye beebiara a EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn amma hɛn ho kwan no."
